summary: The implementation provides comprehensive backend data models and CRUD operations (REQ-1 through REQ-5), a complete frontend UI with navigation and pages for movies, TV shows, and episodes (REQ-6 through REQ-11), and a cohesive amber/gold cinematic theme (REQ-12). However, backend methods for listing all movies and TV shows are missing, preventing the frontend from actually displaying content grids.

missing_requirements.reason: Backend implements individual movie CRUD operations but lacks a method to retrieve all movies. Frontend queries return empty arrays because no getAllMovies or equivalent method exists.

missing_requirements.requirement: Episodes can be listed by show
missing_requirements.reason: While getEpisodesByTVShow exists for listing episodes of a specific show, there is no backend method to list all TV shows, preventing the frontend from displaying the TV shows grid.
